name: Red Planet
overview: Welcome to Mars, the red planet. Meet the gotesque martians who still there for doom. Leds to our hero within the old space station to dynamite the whole area and stop his evil inhabitants. The mission is to find 10 exlosive barrels, bring they to the center of the planet and back to the control center to activate the detonation. In your trip you can take air bottles to refill your breath. There are some ammunition packs provides you 20 bullets. Also you need cards to pass to restricted areas. The first aid kit give you an extra live.
